author: bnicholes
msg: If large file support is enabled allow the file to be split into AP_MAX_SENDFILE sized buckets.  Otherwise Apache will be unable to send files larger than 2 gig due to signed 32-bit limitations.

author: geoff
msg: have_min_module_version() to use proper numeric version strings
